title: Betplay Group
author: Betplay Group
content: Introducing Rich Wilde's Fortune Chase Tournament: Unleash Your Adventurous Spirit and Win!Calling all fortune chasers and thrill seekers! Betplay.io and Play’n GO invites you to join an extraordinary event called Rich Wilde's Fortune Chase Tournament. This is a 14-day tournament with a total cash prize of USD 14,000 that promises to be an epic quest filled with excitement and incredible riches! The entertaining competition will be held this July 17th to July 30th, 2023 that is comprised of two series: Riche Wilde Collect Points (USD 4,000.00) and Rich Wilde’s Best Round (USD 10,000.00). The participating games are: •   Riche Wilde and the Tome of Madness•   Riche Wilde and the Shield of Athena•   Moon Princess Trinity•   Energoonz•   Moon Princess•   Riche Wilde and the Amulet of Dead•   Riche Wilde and the Wandering City•   Rise of Olympus•   Gerad’s Gambit•   Golden Ticket•   Ring of OdinThe series:1.   Collect Points Slot Tournament - USD 4,000 22nd July 2023, 12:00 a.m. GMT+8 to 30th July 2023, 11:59 p.m. GMT+8 (Weekends)For this series, the qualifying minimum stake is USD 0.20, also accessible in the currencies such as EUR, CNY, IDR, MYR, THB, VND, PHP, INR, JPY, KRW, MMK, PKR, and TWD. A game round may have a maximum of 128 points. The objective is to accrue as many points as you can during a tournament while taking part in any qualification games. In the game, points and rank will be shown and updated in real-time. One working day after the conclusion of each daily tournament, the winners will be declared. The player's primary wallet will receive cash credits for the daily awards. 2.   Best Round Slot Tournament - USD 10,000 17th July 2023, 12:00 a.m. GMT+8 to 28th July 2023, 11:59 p.m. GMT+8 (Weekdays)For this series, the qualifying minimum stake is USD 0.20, also accessible in the currencies such as EUR, CNY, IDR, MYR, THB, VND, PHP, INR, JPY, KRW, MMK, PKR, and TWD. Based on the highest single spin win amount multiplied by the wager, the winners are determined. After the campaign has ended, the winners will be announced within 48 hours. The player's primary wallet will receive the monetary prizes as credit.  Time to count your winnings! Don't miss out on this thrilling campaign, join Rich Wilde's Fortune Chase Tournament. Chase the wins to receive your fortune! If you have any questions concerning the campaign, feel free to contact us via our live chat service. https://betplay.io/en/news/rich-wilde%E2%80%99s-fortune-chase
